titles.title: For the relief of Sarabeth M. Davis, Robert S. Borders, Victor Maron, Irving Berke, and Adele E. Conrad.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 3/27/2001--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay Sarabeth M. Davis of Clinton, Washington, Robert S. Borders of Newport Beach, California, Victor Maron and Irving Berke of Long Beach, California, and Adele E. Conrad of Cypress, California, for damages they sustained in connection with the air installation compatible use zone study conducted by the Secretary of the Army with respect to Los Alamitos Army Airfield.
